The guard of Treasures:
All right. To do this, go to rooms of Watchers, who are in the north, south, west and east. In each of these rooms you will need to choose one of four books, which is the real part of the Memoirs Kaeruna. When you take all of the Memoirs, a seal that protects them off, and you can pick up a book.
But remember that you can not leave the room until you pass the test.
